list_files.name: list_files
list_files.note: Lists all files in the current directory with detailed information.

show_hidden_files.name: show_hidden_files
show_hidden_files.note: Displays all files, including hidden ones, in the current directory.

find_file.name: find_file
find_file.note: Searches for a file with the given name in the current directory and subdirectories.

copy_file.name: copy_file
copy_file.note: Copies a file from the source path to the destination path.

move_file.name: move_file
move_file.note: Moves a file from the source path to the destination path.

search_in_files.name: search_in_files
search_in_files.note: Recursively searches for a term within files in the current directory.

check_disk_usage.name: check_disk_usage
check_disk_usage.note: Displays disk usage for files and directories in human-readable format.

show_running_processes.name: show_running_processes
show_running_processes.note: Displays the currently running processes with resource usage.

kill_process.name: kill_process
kill_process.note: Terminates a process with the given process ID (PID).
